summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Home Intruder Alarm System MVP - all core features working correctly

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent accessibility

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (32/32 tests passed)
Dashboard loads with correct UI elements and stats cards
Zone CRUD operations - create, edit, delete zones
Sensor CRUD operations - create motion/door/window sensors
Sensor triggering simulation with proper alerts based on system state
Activity log displays events correctly and supports clearing
Settings page SMS configuration saves properly
Navigation works between all pages (Dashboard, Zones, Sensors, Activity, Settings)
Integration between frontend and backend working properly
Real-time updates and data refresh working
Intrusion detection and logging when system is armed
